AugmentRequest.description: A request to a macro to augment some code.

target.$comment: The class to augment. TODO(davidmorgan): expand to more types of target.

model.$comment: A pre-computed query result for the target.

AugmentResponse.description: Macro's response to an [AugmentRequest]: the resulting augmentations.

enumValueAugmentations.description: Any augmentations to enum values that should be applied to an enum as a result of executing a macro, indexed by the name of the enum.

extendsTypeAugmentations.description: Any extends clauses that should be added to types as a result of executing a macro, indexed by the name of the augmented type declaration.

interfaceAugmentations.description: Any interfaces that should be added to types as a result of executing a macro, indexed by the name of the augmented type declaration.

libraryAugmentations.description: Any augmentations that should be applied to the library as a result of executing a macro.

mixinAugmentations.description: Any mixins that should be added to types as a result of executing a macro, indexed by the name of the augmented type declaration.

newTypeNames.description: The names of any new types declared in [libraryAugmentations].

typeAugmentations.description: Any augmentations that should be applied to a class as a result of executing a macro, indexed by the name of the class.

HostEndpoint.description: A macro host server endpoint. TODO(davidmorgan): this should be a oneOf supporting different types of connection. TODO(davidmorgan): it's not clear if this belongs in this package! But, where else?

HostRequest.description: A request sent from host to macro.

id.description: The id of this request, must be returned in responses.

macroAnnotation.$comment: The annotation identifying the macro that should handle the request.

MacroDescription.description: Information about a macro that the macro provides to the host.

annotation.$comment: The annotation that triggers the macro.

runsInPhases.description: Phases that the macro runs in: 1, 2 and/or 3.

MacroStartedRequest.description: Informs the host that a macro has started.

MacroRequest.description: A request sent from macro to host.

id.description: The id of this request, must be returned in responses.

QueryRequest.description: Macro's query about the code it should augment.

requestId.description: The id of the request this is responding to.
